conbody.p: The following is the hierarchy used for this project - Project2:

There are 3 maps:
the main map is Project2.ditamap
a secondary map called infomap.ditamap linked to Project2.ditamap contains keys for conkeyref
another secondary map called indexmap.ditamap

I broke the document down into small topics which I appended as children to the topichead in order to facilitate reusability, unfortunately, this method had an impact on my ability to format the document as well as if I had added them as new sections and paragraphs - IBM Stored Administrator section
A reference file called source.dita contains the conkeyref references
Images and notes were inserted using conkeyref.
Index: indexmap.ditamap was created for Index Terms, linked to Project2.ditamap
Conkeyref was used in the prolog in autoclassification.dita and licenceusagemetrics.dita to link to the index.
Product metadata was added to the Project2.ditamap, including the brand, product name, number and revision
Copyright metadata was added to the prolog of sources.dita
For conditional processing, a new folder called conditional processing was created, with a subfolder called ditavals. A fitler file called myval.ditaval was created within this folder.

Schemes were applied as follows:
Filtering: In reference topic environmentalsizingguidelines.dita, I created a filter to exclude "Metadata-only not computing a hash" which I had set as expert. Running the transformation excluded this paragraph
Flagging: I edited the products to include Microsoft Hyper-V and then flagged it to change the text colour in microsofthyperv.dita
Flagging: I set the background colour to pale yellow for platform = windows in dataworkbench.dita
Filtering: In Security.dita, I excluded a paragraph with platform = Linux in Encryption of Data at rest section
